did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Baptist Church of Catlin and Dix record book, 1828-1896.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Baptist Church of Catlin and Dix (N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes a list of baptisms and deaths (1830-1889) and covenant meeting minutes.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes a list of baptisms and deaths (1830-1889) and covenant meeting minutes which record church discipline, discussion of employing a pastor, a controversy over when to observe the sabbath, and the acceptance and dismissal of members. This volume is a manuscript copy, made in 1860, of an earlier record book begun in 1828.
